creator: BATALSOFT MUSIC APPS
descriptionHtml:
Why use Drum Solo Rock?

Because it is the most advanced drum kit simulator and it is more lighweight than the rest. Have fun and become a real drummer with the amazing experience of playing rock and drumming with this multitouch acoustic drum kit simulator. Play this game with your fingers (as it they were drumsticks) in your mobile phone or tablet. This drum set game is free, it has fast response, and includes different sound bank sets recorded with studio quality.

Record your songs and show them to your friends later. Play music loud with headset for a superior experience. Drum Solo: Rock! is designed for everyone: children, percussionists, professional musicians, drummers...

The main features are:

- High number of exclusive demo rhythm presets to learn to play drums from all styles (blues, disco, dubstep, jazz, reggaeton, pop ...)
- Customize the background and instruments using your own images and FX sounds.
- Play MP3 and OGG files from your music library. Use the seekbar to find the moment of your favourite song you love
- Export your loop to MP3 and share the file with your friends
- Choose between 5 complete audio packs: Classic Rock, Modern Rock, Heavy Metal, Jazz and Synthesizer
- Multitouch drums. You can touch up to 200 fingers simultaneously.
- Reverb effect simulates a live performance.
- Record your own session and later, you can play on it, like a real drum set machine. Double your experience!. You can record, play and repeat your compositions. You can record un unlimited number of notes in your loops.
- Realistic HQ sampled stereo sounds, including double kick bass, two toms, floor, snare, hi-hat (two positions with the pedal), 2 crash, splash, ride and cowbell
- Animations for each instrument
- Left-handed mode
- Repeat button in order to play continuously your improvisations (playback mode).
- Low latency for the beats (note: depending of your available memory and processor)
- 13 touch sensitive touch pads.
- Very fast loading time
- Use it in conjunction with the rest of Batalsoft apps (bass, piano, guitar...) to form your own band.

Join us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/batalsoft"

- Customize the pads using your own images and sounds. Use Drum Solo Studio in your own way.
- Play MP3 and OGG files from your music library. Use the seekbar to find the moment of your favourite song you love.
- Use the built-in metronome to stay in time.
- Playback speed control for learning, and seekbar to find the preferred moment in the song.
- Import the drums track from your favourite MIDI songs
- Export your loops to MP3, OGG or MIDI and share the file with your friends
- Choose between 5 complete audio packs: Classic Rock, Modern Rock, Heavy Metal, Jazz and Synthesizer

- Reverb effect simulates a live performance.

- Animations for each instrument
- Left-handed mode
- Low latency for the beats (note: depending of your available memory and processor)
- 13 touch sensitive touch pads.
- Very fast loading time
- Use it in conjunction with the rest of Batalsoft apps (bass, piano, guitar...) to form your own band.
- You can acquire a license to unlock all the items and remove ads.

Record your songs and show them to your friends later. Play music loud with headset for a superior experience. Drum Solo Studio is designed for everyone: children, percussionists, professional musicians, drummers...

The main features are:

- High number of exclusive demo rhythm samples to learn to play drums from all styles (rock, blues, disco, dubstep, jazz, reggaeton, heavy metal, pop ...)
- Customize the pads using your own images and sounds. Use Drum Solo Studio in your own way.
- Play MP3 and OGG files from your music library. Use the seekbar to find the moment of your favourite song you love.
- Use the built-in metronome to stay in time.
- Playback speed control for learning, and seekbar to find the preferred moment in the song.
- Import the drums track from your favourite MIDI songs
- Export your loops to MP3, OGG or MIDI and share the file with your friends
- Choose between 5 complete audio packs: Classic Rock, Modern Rock, Heavy Metal, Jazz and Synthesizer
- Multitouch drums. You can touch up to 200 fingers simultaneously.
- Reverb effect simulates a live performance.
- Record your own session and later, you can play on it, like a real drum set machine. Double your experience!. You can record, play and repeat your compositions. You can record un unlimited number of notes in your loops.
- Realistic HQ sampled stereo sounds, including double kick bass, two toms, floor, snare, hi-hat (two positions with the pedal), 2 crash, splash, ride and cowbell
- Animations for each instrument
- Left-handed mode
- Low latency for the beats (note: depending of your available memory and processor)
- 13 touch sensitive touch pads.
- Very fast loading time
- Use it in conjunction with the rest of Batalsoft apps (bass, piano, guitar...) to form your own band.
- You can acquire a license to unlock all the items and remove ads.

Join us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/batalsoft"

- Customize the pads using your own images and sounds. Use Drum Solo Studio in your own way.
- Play MP3 and OGG files from your music library. Use the seekbar to find the moment of your favourite song you love.
- Use the built-in metronome to stay in time.
- Playback speed control for learning, and seekbar to find the preferred moment in the song.
- Import the drums track from your favourite MIDI songs
- Export your loops to MP3, OGG or MIDI and share the file with your friends
- Choose between 5 complete audio packs: Classic Rock, Modern Rock, Heavy Metal, Jazz and Synthesizer
- Multitouch drums. You can touch up to 200 fingers simultaneously.
- Reverb effect simulates a live performance.
- Record your own session and later, you can play on it, like a real drum set machine. Double your experience!. You can record, play and repeat your compositions. You can record un unlimited number of notes in your loops.
- Realistic HQ sampled stereo sounds, including double kick bass, two toms, floor, snare, hi-hat (two positions with the pedal), 2 crash, splash, ride and cowbell
- Animations for each instrument
- Left-handed mode
- Low latency for the beats (note: depending of your available memory and processor)
- 13 touch sensitive touch pads.
- Very fast loading time
- Use it in conjunction with the rest of Batalsoft apps (bass, piano, guitar...) to form your own band.
- You can acquire a license to unlock all the items and remove ads.

Join us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/batalsoft"

Record your songs and show them to your friends later. Play music loud with headset for a superior experience. Drum Solo Studio is designed for everyone: children, percussionists, professional musicians, drummers...

The main features are:

- High number of exclusive demo rhythm lessons to learn to play drums from all styles (rock, blues, disco, dubstep, jazz, reggaeton, heavy metal, pop ...)
- Customize the pads using your own images and sounds. Use Drum Solo Studio in your own way.
- Connect a MIDI electronic Drumkit or keyboard to expand your creativity.
- Play MP3 and OGG files from your music library. Use the seekbar to find the moment of your favourite song you love.
- Use the built-in metronome to stay in time.
- Playback speed control for learning, and seekbar to find the preferred moment in the song.
- Import the drums track from your favourite MIDI songs
- Export your loops to MP3, OGG or MIDI and share the file with your friends
- Choose between 5 complete audio packs: Classic Rock, Modern Rock, Heavy Metal, Jazz and Synthesizer
- Multitouch drums. You can touch up to 200 fingers simultaneously.
- Reverb effect simulates a live performance.
- Record your own session and later, you can play on it, like a real drum set machine. Double your experience!. You can record, play and repeat your compositions. You can record un unlimited number of notes in your loops.
- Realistic HQ sampled stereo sounds, including double kick bass, two toms, floor, snare, hi-hat (two positions with the pedal), 2 crash, splash, ride and cowbell
- Animations for each instrument
- Left-handed mode
- Low latency for the beats (note: depending of your available memory and processor)
- 13 touch sensitive touch pads.
- Very fast loading time
- Use it in conjunction with the rest of Batalsoft apps (bass, piano, guitar...) to form your own band.
- You can acquire a license to unlock all the items and remove ads.

Join us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/batalsoft"

container.value:

Avenida de la Investigación s/n B25
06006 Badajoz
Spain

creator: Batalsoft Music Apps
descriptionHtml:
Join the community of over 10 million drummers and download Drum Solo Studio today!

Drum Solo Studio unleashes an exceptional drumming experience, empowering you to have fun and become a skilled drummer. With the app's multitouch acoustic drum kit simulator, you can play drums on your mobile phone or tablet with your fingers. The app is free and offers studio-quality sound banks with fast and precise response. Take your drumming skills to the next level!

It includes many incredible features such as MIDI support, the ability to customize the drum pad positions and sizes, changing the drum sounds and images, recording your sessions, and exporting your compositions to different formats. With these powerful tools, you can create your own unique drumming experience

Play music loud with headset for a superior experience. Drum Solo Studio is designed for everyone who loves drums: beginners, percussionists, professional musicians, drummers...

The main advanced features are:

- 6 complete audio kits: Standard, Heavy Metal, Modern Rock, Jazz, Pop and Synthesizer.
- Record your sessions and later, you can play on top on your own loops, like a real drum set machine.
- High number of exclusive demo lessons to learn to play drums from all styles according to your rhythm skill. You can find loops of rock, blues, disco, dubstep, jazz, reggaeton, heavy metal, pop ...
- Customize drum pads with your own images and sounds imported directly from your mobile device, and adjust the position and size of the instruments to your liking.
- Start jamming on top of pre-recorded backing tracks of different styles, creating an interactive drumming experience.
- Connect a MIDI eDrum or keyboard controller to expand your creativity.
- Apply real-time effects like equalization, reverb, compression, and delay, allowing you to fine-tune your live drumming sound and create your desired ambience
- Import the drums track from your favourite MIDI songs from your storage
- Play MP3 and OGG files from your music library.
- Export your loops to MP3, OGG, MIDI and PCM WAV and share the file with your friends


Drum Solo Studio also includes these additional features to enhance your drumming experience:

- Adjust individually the volume of each instrument and the background music, giving you complete control over the sound of your drumming
- Use the built-in metronome to stay in time.
- Playback speed control for learning, and seekbar to find the preferred moment in the song.
- Realistic HQ sampled stereo sounds, including double kick bass, two toms, floor, snare, hi-hat (two positions with the pedal), 2 crash, splash, ride and cowbell
- Awesome animations for each instrument
- Left-handed mode
- Low latency for the beats (note: depending of your available memory and processor)
- 13 touch sensitive multitouch pads. Up to 200 fingers simultaneously.
- Very fast loading time
- Use it in conjunction with the rest of Batalsoft apps (bass, piano, guitar...) to form your own band.

Drum Solo Studio is free, but you can acquire a license to unlock some items and remove ads.

Join our community on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/batalsoft

creator: Batalsoft Music Apps
descriptionHtml:
Your Ultimate Acoustic and Electronic Drum Experience

Join over 10 million drummers and unleash your inner rhythm with Drum Solo Studio! Whether you're a beginner, percussionist, or professional musician, our free app offers a complete drum set experience on your mobile phone or tablet, with realistic sounds and the fastest, most precise response on Android.

Take your drumming skills to the next level with our powerful tools and incredible features.

Key Features:

• Multi-touch acoustic and electronic drum kit simulator with the lowest latency on Android and fast loading times
• Studio-quality sound banks with fast, precise response
• 6 complete audio kits: Standard, Heavy Metal, Modern Rock, Jazz, Pop, and Synthesizer
• MIDI support for connecting e-drums or keyboard controllers
• Customizable drum pad positions, sizes, sounds, and images
• Record, playback, and export your sessions in various formats (MP3, OGG, MIDI, PCM WAV)
• Use up to 200 fingers simultaneously on 13 touch-sensitive pads

Learn and Improve:

• Stimulate your musical talent with exclusive demo lessons covering various styles: rock, blues, disco, dubstep, jazz, reggaeton, heavy metal, pop, and more
• Interactive exercises and challenges to enhance your drumming technique and expand your creativity
• Practice drum fills, grooves, patterns, and rudiments
• Tempo control and playback speed adjustment with a seekbar for perfecting your timing
• Metronome to keep you in sync
• Class mode and interactive games to make learning fun

Advanced Features:

• Real-time effects: EQ, reverb, compression, and delay
• Import MIDI tracks from your favorite songs
• Play along with MP3 and OGG files from your music library, including drumless tracks for jamming with backing tracks
• Left-handed mode
• Drum set machine functionality

Customize Your Experience:

• Adjust individual instrument volumes and mute instruments
• Realistic high-quality sampled stereo sounds
• Double kick bass, two toms, floor tom, snare (with rimshot), hi-hat (two positions with pedal), 2 crash cymbals, splash, ride, and cowbell
• Awesome animations for each instrument
• Change drum sounds and images to create your own custom drum kit
• Switch hi-hat position from left to right
• Drum pitch control

Share and Collaborate:

• Export your loops and share them with friends
• Use in conjunction with other Batalsoft apps (bass, piano, guitar) to form your own virtual band
• Connect with a Facebook community of drummers to share tips and performances
• Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/batalsoft
• Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/batalsoft/

Experience Drum Solo Studio—your complete drum kit for finger drumming, anytime, anywhere. It's like having drumsticks, a practice pad, and a full drum set right in your pocket! Stimulate your musical talent and become the drummer you've always wanted to be with this unique experience designed for everyone who loves drums.

For the best experience, use headphones and play loud. Suitable for beginners, percussionists, professional musicians, drummers, and rhythm enthusiasts of all levels.

Drum Solo Studio is free to download and use. However, you can acquire a license to unlock additional items and remove ads, enhancing your drumming experience even further.

Download now and start your drumming journey with Drum Solo Studio—where rhythm meets technology in your pocket!
